Title: MyBusiness.NET - The .NET OpenSource ERP - System
Description: MyBusiness.NET is a .NET OpenSource ERP - System developed in C# using Microsoft Visual Studio LightSwitch Beta 2
HomeWiki:
Project Description

MyBusiness.NET is a .NET OpenSource ERP - System developed in C# using Microsoft Visual Studio LightSwitch Beta 2

LightSwitch and MyBusiness.NET

What is the right architecture of an ERP system? This is a good question, we have tried many ways, tools and patters but the effort to design and implement this in a complex software system is very high. Fortunately have we tried LightSwitch a we think LightSwitch gives us a simpler and faster way to create high-quality business applications like MyBusiness.NET.
